definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
medium/intermediary/matchmaker/go-between/abbr. for 媒體|媒体[mei2 ti3], media, esp. news media

sentences.english: Methods Multimedia technology was used in cardiothoracic surgical teaching.
sentences.chinese: 方法在胸心外科教学中使用多媒体教学方法。

sentences.english: Bring forward the architecture of content-based multimedia database engine.
sentences.chinese: 提出开研究了基于内容多媒体数据库引擎的体系结构。

sentences.english: The Network Multimedia CAI Courseware provides a bran - new teaching mode.
sentences.chinese: 网络多媒体CAI课件提供了一种全新的教学模式。

sentences.english: With the muti-media in the class, it can enhance students' interests.
sentences.chinese: 随着多媒体出现在课堂上，它能增强学生的兴趣。

sentences.english: So the Chinese teaching with multi-media aids in primary school still needs to fo…
sentences.chinese: 所以，多媒体辅助语文教学需以人为本。

sentences.english: First, I'll show you an 8-minute multimedia.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我为您映放8分钟的多媒体简介。

sentences.english: This design is to manufactures multi-media English teaching software.
sentences.chinese: 本设计是制作一部多媒体英语教学软件。
我们买了一套多媒体百科全书。

sentences.english: Zhou Yi is a multi-media artist residing in both Paris and Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 周依是居住于巴黎和上海的多媒体艺术家。

sentences.english: Multicast is becoming a key requirement of networks supporting multimedia applications.
sentences.chinese: 多点通信是网络支持多媒体业务的关键技术之一。

sentences.english: This paper presented the methods of developing the multimedia courseware on architectural graphics.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了多媒体课件《建筑图学》的开发方法。

sentences.english: By means of this software, called Multi-Media Education Control System abbrev.
sentences.chinese: 纵观现有的多媒体教学软件，均缺少控制。

sentences.english: Create musical animated multimedia computer cards for all occasions.
sentences.chinese: 创造音乐动画多媒体电脑卡的各种场合。

sentences.english: In fact, some people see multimedia simply as the marriage of PCs and video.
sentences.chinese: 事实上有人就简单地认为多媒体是电脑和电视的结合。

sentences.english: Typical applications include live concerts and all types of multi-media events.
sentences.chinese: 典型应用包括现场音乐会和各种多媒体活动。

sentences.english: Conclusion Multimedia-aided teaching is an effective way to improve cardiothoracic surgical teaching.
sentences.chinese: 结论多媒体教学方法有助于提高胸心外科教学效果。
